subdisciplines.name: Ecohydrology
subdisciplines.description: The study of interactions between ecological and hydrological processes across multiple scales, from the leaf to the catchment.

subdisciplines.name: Groundwater Hydrology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the movement and storage of groundwater in the soil and rocks beneath the Earth's surface.

subdisciplines.name: Surface Water Hydrology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the movement and storage of surface water in streams, rivers, lakes, and wetlands.
